## bugs and requests
We're keen to know about any bugs you find. We'd also like to know if you have any requests. Use the [issues tracker](https://github.com/jdyen/trophic/issues) on GitHub to log issues or requests.
      
## contributing code
We welcome your contributions. If you have an idea for something new, or a possible solution to an existing issue, using the [issues tracker](https://github.com/jdyen/trophic/issues) to discuss it will avoid duplication of effort.
      
## new applications
We're looking to add more functionality to `trophic`. Several key tasks are listed as open [issues](https://github.com/jdyen/trophic/issues), but we're happy to chat about other applications of this modelling framework.
